token"},"returns":{"priceResult":"The price result (spot price before & after the swap, latest oracle price in & out)","swapResult":"The swap result (amount in, spread and tax base in)"}},"getAmountOutGivenInMMM(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"maxPrice":"The maximum spot price accepted before the swap","minAmountOut":"The minimum amount of tokenOut that can be received","tokenAmountIn":"The fixed amount of tokenIn to be swapped","tokenIn":"The address of the input token","tokenOut":"The address of the received token"},"returns":{"priceResult":"The price result (spot price before & after the swap, latest oracle price in & out)","swapResult":"The swap result (amount out, spread and tax base in)"}},"getBalance(address)":{"details":"Returns the balance of a binded token"},"getController()":{"details":"Returns the current controller of the pool"},"getCoverageParameters()":{"details":"Returns the coverage parameters of the pool"},"getDenormalizedWeight(address)":{"details":"Returns the initial weight of a binded token The initial weight is the un-adjusted weight set by the controller at bind The adjusted weight is the corrected weight based on the token's price performance: adjusted_weight = initial_weight * current_price / initial_price"},"getExitPool(uint256)":{"params":{"poolAmountIn":"The amount of pool shares a LP wishes to liquidate for tokens"},"returns":{"tokenAmountsOut":"The token amounts received"}},"getJoinPool(address,uint256)":{"details":"The amountIn of the specified token as input may differ at the exit due to rounding discrepancies","params":{"tokenAmountIn":"The approximate amount of tokenIn to be swapped","tokenIn":"The address of tokenIn"},"returns":{"poolAmountOut":"The pool amount out received","tokenAmountsIn":"The exact amounts of tokenIn needed"}},"getJoinswapExternAmountInMMM(address,uint256)":{"details":"The remaining tokens designate the tokens whose balances do not change during the joinswap","params":{"tokenAmountIn":"The amount of tokenIn to be added to the pool","tokenIn":"The address of tokenIn"},"returns":{"poolAmountOut":"The received pool token amount out"}},"getSpotPriceSansFee(address,address)":{"returns":{"spotPrice":"The spot price of tokenOut in terms of tokenIn"}},"getSwapFee()":{"details":"Returns the swap fee of the pool"},"getTokenOracleInitialPrice(address)":{"details":"Returns the token's price when it was binded to the pool"},"getTokenPriceOracle(address)":{"details":"Returns the oracle's address of a token"},"getTokens()":{"details":"Returns the binded tokens"},"gulp(address)":{"details":"Absorb any tokens that have been sent to this contract into the pool","params":{"token":"The token's address"}},"isBound(address)":{"details":"Returns true if the token is binded to the pool"},"isFinalized()":{"details":"Returns true if a liquidity provider can join the pool A trader can swap on the pool if the pool is either finalized or isPublicSwap"},"isPublicSwap()":{"details":"Returns true if a trader can swap on the pool"},"joinPool(uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"The order of maxAmount of each token must be the same as the _tokens' addresses stored in the pool","params":{"maxAmountsIn":"Maximum accepted token amount in","poolAmountOut":"Amount of pool shares a LP wishes to receive"}},"joinswapExternAmountInMMM(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"The remaining tokens designate the tokens whose balances do not change during the joinswap","params":{"minPoolAmountOut":"The minimum amount of pool tokens that can be received","tokenAmountIn":"The amount of tokenIn to be added to the pool","tokenIn":"The address of tokenIn"},"returns":{"poolAmountOut":"The received pool amount out"}},"rebindMMM(address,uint256,uint80,address)":{"params":{"balance":"The token's balance","denorm":"The token's weight","priceFeedAddress":"The token's Chainlink price feed","token":"The token's address"}},"revokeFactoryControl()":{"details":"Factory control can only be revoked by the factory and not the pool controller"},"setControllerAndTransfer(address)":{"details":"It is recommended to use transferOwnership/acceptOwnership logic for safer transfers to avoid any faulty input This function is useful when creating pools using a proxy contract and transfer pool assets WARNING: Binded assets are also transferred to the new controller if the pool is not finalized"},"setPriceStatisticsLookbackStepInRound(uint8)":{"details":"This corresponds to the roundId lookback step when looking for historical prices"},"setPublicSwap(bool)":{"details":"Unfinalized pool enables exclusively the controller to add liquidity into the pool"},"swapExactAmountInMMM(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"maxPrice":"The maximum spot price accepted before the swap","minAmountOut":"The minimum accepted amount of tokenOut to be received","tokenAmountIn":"The exact amount of tokenIn to be swapped","tokenIn":"The address of the input token","tokenOut":"The address of the received token"},"returns":{"spotPriceAfter":"The spot price of tokenOut in terms of tokenIn after the swap","tokenAmountOut":"The token amount out received"}},"swapExactAmountOutMMM(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"maxAmountIn":"The maximum amount of tokenIn that can be swapped","maxPrice":"The maximum spot price accepted before the swap","tokenAmountOut":"The exact amount of tokenOut to be received","tokenIn":"The address of the input token","tokenOut":"The address of the received token"},"returns":{"spotPriceAfter":"The spot price of token out in terms of token in after the swap","tokenAmountIn":"The amount of tokenIn added to the pool"}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Returns the amount of tokens in existence."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"The function will revert if there are binded tokens in an un-finalized pool This prevents any accidental loss of funds for the current controller"},"unbindMMM(address)":{"details":"The function will return the token's balance back to the controller","params":{"token":"The token's address"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"LOG_EXIT(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an LP withdraws one or multiple assets from the pool"},"LOG_JOIN(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an LP joins the pool with 1 or multiple assets"},"LOG_NEW_CONTROLLER(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new controller is assigned to the pool"},"LOG_NEW_ORACLE_STATE(address,address,uint256,uint8,string)":{"notice":"Emitted when a token is binded/rebinded"},"LOG_SWAP(address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted after each swap"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"acceptOwnership()":{"notice":"Allows a controller transfer to be completed by the recipient"},"bindMMM(address,uint256,uint80,address)":{"notice":"Bind a new token to the pool"},"decimals()":{"notice":"Returns token's decimals"},"decreaseApproval(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Decreases an address approval by the input amount"},"exitPool(uint256,uint256[])":{"notice":"Remove liquidity from a pool"},"exitswapPoolAmountInMMM(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Exit a pool with a single asset given the pool token weights"},"getAmountInGivenOutMMM(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Computes the amount of tokenIn needed to receive a fixed amount of tokenOut"},"getAmountOutGivenInMMM(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Computes the amount of tokenOut received when swapping a fixed amount of tokenIn"},"getExitPool(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the token amounts received for a given pool shares in"},"getJoinPool(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the token amounts in required and pool shares received when joining the pool given an amount of tokenIn"},"getJoinswapExternAmountInMMM(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Computes the amount of pool tokens received when joining a pool with a single asset of fixed amount in"},"getSpotPriceSansFee(address,address)":{"notice":"Returns the spot price without fees of a token pair"},"giveFactoryControl()":{"notice":"Gives back factory control over the pool parameters"},"increaseApproval(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Increases an address approval by the input amount"},"joinPool(uint256,uint256[])":{"notice":"Add liquidity to a pool and credit msg.sender"},"joinswapExternAmountInMMM(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Join a pool with a single asset with a fixed amount in"},"name()":{"notice":"Returns token's name"},"rebindMMM(address,uint256,uint80,address)":{"notice":"Replace a binded token's balance, weight and price feed's address"},"revokeFactoryControl()":{"notice":"Revokes factory control over pool parameters"},"setControllerAndTransfer(address)":{"notice":"Allows a controller to transfer ownership to a new address"},"setDynamicCoverageFeesHorizon(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets dynamic coverage fees ratio"},"setPriceStatisticsLookbackInRound(uint8)":{"notice":"Sets price statistics maximum lookback in round"},"setPriceStatisticsLookbackInSec(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets price statistics maximum lookback in seconds"},"setPriceStatisticsLookbackStepInRound(uint8)":{"notice":"Sets price statistics lookback step in round"},"setPublicSwap(bool)":{"notice":"Enables public swaps on the pool but does not finalize the parameters"},"setSwapFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets swap fee"},"swapExactAmountInMMM(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Swap two tokens given the exact amount of documentation.text: @dev Returns true if a trader can swap on the pool

@dev Returns true if a liquidity provider can join the pool
 A trader can swap on the pool if the pool is either finalized or isPublicSwap
@dev Returns true if the token is binded to the pool
@dev Returns the binded tokens

@dev Returns the initial weight of a binded token
 The initial weight is the un-adjusted weight set by the controller at bind
 The adjusted weight is the corrected weight based on the token's price performance:
 adjusted_weight = initial_weight * current_price / initial_price
@dev Returns the balance of a binded token
@dev Returns the swap fee of the pool
@dev Returns the current controller of the pool
@notice Sets swap fee
@notice Allows a controller transfer to be completed by the recipient

@notice Revokes factory control over pool parameters
 @dev Factory control can only be revoked by the factory and not the pool controller
@notice Gives back factory control over the pool parameters

@notice Enables public swaps on the pool but does not finalize the parameters
 @dev Unfinalized pool enables exclusively the controller to add liquidity into the pool
@notice Enables publicswap and finalizes the pool's tokens, price feeds, initial shares, balances and weights

@dev Absorb any tokens that have been sent to this contract into the pool
 @param token The token's address

params.tokenOut: The address of the received token

returns.priceResult: The price result (spot price before & after the swap, latest oracle price in & out)

returns.priceResult: The price result (spot price before & after the swap, latest oracle price in & out)
returns.swapResult: The swap result (amount out, spread and tax base in)

getBalance(address).details: Returns the balance of a binded token

getController().details: Returns the current controller of the pool

getCoverageParameters().details: Returns the coverage parameters of the pool

getDenormalizedWeight(address).details: Returns the initial weight of a binded token The initial weight is the un-adjusted weight set by the controller at bind The adjusted weight is the corrected weight based on the token's price performance: adjusted_weight = initial_weight * current_price / initial_price

params.poolAmountIn: The amount of pool shares a LP wishes to liquidate for tokens

getJoinPool(address,uint256).details: The amountIn of the specified token as input may differ at the exit due to rounding discrepancies

returns.tokenAmountsIn: The exact amounts of tokenIn needed

returns.poolAmountOut: The received pool token amount out

returns.spotPrice: The spot price of tokenOut in terms of tokenIn

getSwapFee().details: Returns the swap fee of the pool

getTokenOracleInitialPrice(address).details: Returns the token's price when it was binded to the pool

getTokenPriceOracle(address).details: Returns the oracle's address of a token

gulp(address).details: Absorb any tokens that have been sent to this contract into the pool

isBound(address).details: Returns true if the token is binded to the pool

isFinalized().details: Returns true if a liquidity provider can join the pool A trader can swap on the pool if the pool is either finalized or isPublicSwap

isPublicSwap().details: Returns true if a trader can swap on the pool

joinPool(uint256,uint256[]).details: The order of maxAmount of each token must be the same as the _tokens' addresses stored in the pool

params.poolAmountOut: Amount of pool shares a LP wishes to receive

params.minPoolAmountOut: The minimum amount of pool tokens that can be received
params.tokenAmountIn: The amount of tokenIn to be added to the pool

revokeFactoryControl().details: Factory control can only be revoked by the factory and not the pool controller

setControllerAndTransfer(address).details: It is recommended to use transferOwnership/acceptOwnership logic for safer transfers to avoid any faulty input This function is useful when creating pools using a proxy contract and transfer pool assets WARNING: Binded assets are also transferred to the new controller if the pool is not finalized

setPriceStatisticsLookbackStepInRound(ui.details: This corresponds to the roundId lookback step when looking for historical prices

setPublicSwap(bool).details: Unfinalized pool enables exclusively the controller to add liquidity into the pool

params.minAmountOut: The minimum accepted amount of tokenOut to be received
params.tokenAmountIn: The exact amount of tokenIn to be swapped

returns.spotPriceAfter: The spot price of token out in terms of token in after the swap
returns.tokenAmountIn: The amount of tokenIn added to the pool

totalSupply().details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

transferOwnership(address).details: The function will revert if there are binded tokens in an un-finalized pool This prevents any accidental loss of funds for the current controller

unbindMMM(address).details: The function will return the token's balance back to the controller

LOG_JOIN(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when an LP joins the pool with 1 or multiple assets
